(root).properties.connections.frontend: Additional property anotherThing is not allowed
(root).properties.connections.gateway.kind: properties.connections.gateway.kind must be one of the following: "azure.com/KeyVault", "azure.com/ServiceBusQueue", "dapr.io/Invoke", "dapr.io/PubSubTopic", "dapr.io/StateStore", "Grpc", "Http", "microsoft.com/SQL", "mongo.com/MongoDB", "redislabs.com/Redis"
(root).properties.connections.gateway: Additional property anotherThing is not allowed
(root).properties.container.env.COol?: Invalid type. Expected: string, given: boolean
(root).properties.container.image: Invalid type. Expected: string, given: integer
(root).properties.container.ports.grpc.protocol: properties.container.ports.grpc.protocol must be one of the following: "TCP", "UDP"
(root).properties.container.ports.web: containerPort is required
(root).properties.container.readinessProbe: Additional property containerPort is not allowed
(root).properties.container.livenessProbe: path is required
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol1: mountPath is required
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol1: managedStore is required
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol2: source is required
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol3.kind: properties.container.volumes.vol3.kind must be one of the following: "ephemeral"
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol4.rbac: properties.container.volumes.vol4.rbac must be one of the following: "read", "write"
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol5.managedStore: properties.container.volumes.vol5.managedStore must be one of the following: "memory", "disk"
(root).properties.container.volumes.vol6: kind is required
